name: baseline-guardrails
description: Baseline Guardrails monorepo: core engine, CLI scanner, GitHub Action

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:helpers && npm run build:cli && npm run build:action && npm run build:eslint && npm run build:vscode
scripts.test: npm run build && npm --prefix packages/core run test && npm --prefix packages/cli run test && npm --prefix packages/action run test && npm --prefix packages/eslint-plugin-baseline run test
scripts.release:publish: npm -w packages/core publish --access public && npm -w packages/helpers publish --access public && npm -w packages/cli publish --access public && npm -w packages/eslint-plugin-baseline publish --access public && npm -w packages/action publish --access public
